tool_description: Provisions and initializes mobile devices with specified configurations, preparing them for test execution.

device_ids.description: List of device identifiers to provision

provision_type.description: Type of provisioning: physical, simulator, or cloud

boot_timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for device boot (seconds)

error_messages: Device provisioning failed: One or more devices could not be initialized
Invalid provision type: Must be 'physical', 'simulator', or 'cloud'
Boot timeout exceeded: Device failed to boot within specified timeout
Device not found: One or more device IDs are invalid
usage: Provide device_ids and provision_type to initialize devices for testing, optionally set boot_timeout for custom wait times.

provisioned_devices.description: List of successfully provisioned device identifiers

session_id.description: Unique session identifier for this provisioning
